page.title: 09OVERBURY C.E.FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called Overbury C.E. First School.It is in{Overbury Village on the south side of{Bredon Hill.}Most of the children who attend the school come from the nearby villages of { {Kemerton,Overbury}and{Conderton}and they are aged from four to ten years. It is a small school with forty five pupils in two classes.There are two teachers and a part time secretary. In addition five other adults teach at least one lesson a week, mainly Music or Craft.There is also a caretaker and a lady who looks after us at lunch- time.The School, built of Cotswold stone, opened in 1877 and is shaped like a cross.There is a twelve metre high{Bell Tower}which we use as our school badge. The Junior Classroom is large,6m.* 14m.,with wood panelling half way up the walls and wall paper above this.
